comment: TrainDetectionSystem + mapped from ERA ontology by Smart Data Models adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ERA/master/TrainDetectionSystem/schema.json
description: System used to detect the position of vehicles in the railway track.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: flangeLubeRules
contents.comment: Existence of rules on on-board flange lubrication

contents.name: frenchTrainDetectionSystemLimitation
contents.comment: Section with train detection limitation, only for the French network

contents.name: frequencyBandsForDetection
contents.comment: Frequency bands for detection

contents.name: maxDistConsecutiveAxles
contents.comment: Maximum permitted distance between two consecutive axles in case of TSI non-compliance

contents.name: maxDistEndTrainFirstAxle
contents.comment: Maximum distance between end of train and first axle

contents.name: maxFlangeHeight
contents.comment: Maximum permitted height of the flange

contents.name: maxImpedanceWheelset
contents.comment: Maximum permitted impedance between opposite wheels of a wheelset when not TSI compliant

contents.name: maxSandingOutput
contents.comment: Maximum amount of sand

contents.name: maximumInterferenceCurrent
contents.comment: Maximum interference current

contents.name: minVehicleImpedance
contents.comment: Vehicle impedance

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: requiredSandingOverride
contents.comment: Sanding override by driver required

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: tdsFrenchTrainDetectionSystemLimitation
contents.comment: Section with train detection limitation, only for the French network

contents.name: tdsMaximumMagneticField
contents.comment: Train detection system maximum magnetic field

contents.name: tdsMinAxleLoadVehicleCategory
contents.comment: Train detection system min axle load vehicle category

contents.name: trainDetectionSystemSpecificCheck
contents.comment: Type of track circuits to which specific checks are needed

contents.name: trainDetectionSystemSpecificCheckDocument
contents.comment: Document with the procedure(s) related to the type of train detection systems declared in 1.2.1.1.6.1

contents.name: trainDetectionSystemType
contents.comment: Type of train detection system

contents.name: tsiCompliantCompositeBrakeBlocks
contents.comment: TSI compliance of rules on the use of composite brake blocks

contents.name: tsiCompliantFerromagneticWheel
contents.comment: TSI compliance of Ferromagnetic characteristics of wheel material required

contents.name: tsiCompliantMaxDistConsecutiveAxles
contents.comment: TSI compliance of maximum permitted distance between two consecutive axles

contents.name: tsiCompliantMaxImpedanceWheelset
contents.comment: TSI compliance of maximum permitted impedance between opposite wheels of a wheelset

contents.name: tsiCompliantMetalConstruction
contents.comment: TSI compliance of rules for vehicle metal construction

contents.name: tsiCompliantMetalFreeSpace
contents.comment: TSI compliance of rules for metal-free space around wheels

contents.name: tsiCompliantRSTShuntImpedance
contents.comment: TSI compliance of rules on combination of RST characteristics influencing shunting impedance

contents.name: tsiCompliantSandCharacteristics
contents.comment: TSI Compliance of rules on sand characteristics

contents.name: tsiCompliantSanding
contents.comment: TSI compliance of sanding

contents.name: tsiCompliantShuntDevices
contents.comment: TSI compliance of rules on shunt assisting devices

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
